analysis.description:
CryptoBabyName._update (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#110-133) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- idx == 0xFFFF

CryptoBabyName._update (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#110-133) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- idx == 0xFFFF (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#113-132)
	- updated > currentBottom (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#117-132)

CryptoBabyName.bottomName (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#156-172) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- t < name (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#167-170)
	- j < n (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#164-171)

CryptoBabyName.getTopN (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#172-206) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- n > allNames.length (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#176-178)
	- j < n (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#181-206)
	- allNames[i] > maxScore (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#185-195)
	- i < cnt (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#183-198)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_value' of CryptoBabyName.redeem (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#236) is not in mixedCase

CryptoBabyName.S_SELECTED_POS (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#31-32) is never used in CryptoBabyName
CryptoBabyName.S_SELECTED_SIZE (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#32-36) is never used in CryptoBabyName
CryptoBabyName.metadata (/unique_contracts/0x8eaffe914e5bbf6784236d3f702549d8c9533d03.sol#46-47) is never used in CryptoBabyName
